thread.title: Steve Martin, Edie Brickell musical coming to Broadway
thread.title_full: Steve Martin, Edie Brickell musical coming to Broadway

title: Steve Martin, Edie Brickell musical coming to Broadway
text: > Entertainment Steve Martin, Edie Brickell musical coming to Broadway In this Sept. 2, 2015 photo, Edie Brickell, left, and Steve Martin pose for a portrait in New York to promote their new album, "So Familiar." Martin and Brickell will light up the Great White Way in the new musical "Bright Star." They collaborated on the music, with Brickell penning the lyrics and Martin writing the story. It was inspired by their collaboration on the CD “Love Has Come for You.” (Photo by Victoria Will/Invision/AP)
